name: Chess Battlefield
description:
Have some strategy fun with friends in the modern rendition of Chess

DLC/Update Planned

 

Left Click = Interact with Menus/Buttons

Right Click = Open Stats Panel

 Space = Switch Turn

All pieces move like normal Chess, but they can only attack in the 4 adjacent tiles. Pieces can only move and attack once per turn. Castles produce 5 coins per turn. The game ends when a king dies. Whoever's king dies loses.
